LightningComponentBundle.description: Given an audit response record, this component will display a list of the before and after values.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API name
property.description: The developer name of the object's audit history being viewed

property.name: auditRecordResponseAccount
property.label: Account audit record
property.description: The account audit record that contains the before and after states as well as fields changed
